Package co.uk.niadel.mpi.util

General utillity classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BlockDirectionsMod
    List of directions as ints used in common.block, as an interface for easy use.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayUtils  
    ByteManipulationUtils  
    DoubleMap<K,V>
    Improved version of Map, allowing you to get the key by the value.
    FileUtils
    Partially borrowed and modified code from the N-API installer.
    ListUtils  
    MCData
    Used to get things like the world object and whether or not it is the client side or not.
    MCUtils  
    ModCrashLog  
    ModList
    A wrapper list around a list of mod containers (either Mod or Library at time of writing) for convenience.
    NAPILogHelper
    Is in charge of logging things.
    ParseUtils  
    UniqueIdAcquirer
    Important class necessary for internal ID handling until said id necessity is removed.
    UniqueNumberAcquirer
    Like SafeIDAquirer, but more permanent and useful.
    UtilityMethods
    Assorted methods that didn't really fit in the other utility classes.
